column3:
Doesn't work (nothing is printed):

```
src	est_bitcoin.exe -l test_suite -k stdout -e stdout 2> NUL
Command exited with code -1073741819
Looks like #17573 may be causing test_bitcoin.exe to seemingly do nothing. Currently tracking down why.

Running the `test_bitcoin.exe` with the addition of `-l test_suite` adds just under 1000 lines of logs to the appveyor output. I suspect it has a negligible impact on the appveyor job performance.\n\nMy concern would be for contributors needing to look at the logs the burden is increased. I don't think it gives us a lot of bang for our buck as most of the failures are at the build stage or the p
Going to close. @sipsorcery maybe you'd like to pick this up if you think it's an improvement.
that is going to print the boost test messages always, even if everything passes\n\nI am not sure about any log limits for appveyor, but this seems a bit verbose to me
Also, it would be nice to run the tests in parallel (like we do with automake `make check -j xx`)
Jup, it does print it unconditionally: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/builds/29582061#L1000
